directions: In each of four 8-ounce mugs, combine 3 tablespoons (1 jigger) of the liqueur and 1 teaspoon of the brown sugar, divide the coffee, heated if necessary, among the mugs, and stir the drinks until the sugar is dissolved. Top each drink with a dollop of the whipped cream and sprinkle the whipped cream with the cinnamon.
ingredients: 4 teaspoons firmly packed dark brown sugar, or to taste
Lightly sweetened whipped cream to taste
title: Mexican Coffee
